modName: Description file builder for OMOD packages
summary: This program helps you to create the info.xml for OMOD package. This file using to display mod readme in the Nexus Mod Manager. / 26.04.13 -  Updated and translated to English.
descriptionHtml:
English:
This program helps you create info.xml for OMOD package. This file using to display mod readme in Nexus Mod Manager.

How to use:
1) Launch, input information into textboxes, select mod type (mod types ID was taken from http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/categories/ page) and click \"Generate info.xml\". You may use some forum bb codes - \"i\",\"b\",\"u\",\"center\",\"url\",\"img\",\"color\". About screenshots - you should paste one link per line in both textboxes. Then links will be wrapped by \"url\" and \"img\" tags to provide screenshots with preview. If thumbnail window left blank, then content of the screenshot window will go to xml without being processed - for prebuild set, for example by uploading images to image hosting and getting link \"for forums with preview\".

2) In the mod folder you should create folder named \"fomod\" and place generated info.xml to this folder.
3) Compress mod files to zip, and after that change extension of that file from \"zip\" to \"omod\".
4) Double click on the omod file to add him to the Nexus Mod Manager.
Done.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
04.05.13 - Update 1.2

- If a textfield left blank - this textfield won\'t appear in the result file.
- Changed some labels and default text for textboxes.
- Now after paste a link to thumb/full screenshot linebreak will be added automatically.
- Now creating \"fomod\" folder and placing \"info.xml\" into it. You need only copy that folder to the location of you mod esp and archive mod.
--------------------------------------------------------------------

files.name: Descriptioner 1_1 English
files.changelogHtml:
Fix some bugs and separate screenshot window into window for thumbs and window for full size.
Translate to English.
Minor text and interface changes.

files.name: Descriptioner 1_2 English
files.changelogHtml:
If a textfield left blank - this textfield won't appear in the result file.
Changed some label and default text for textboxes.
Now after pasting a link to thumb/full screenshot linebreak will be added automatically.
Now creating "fomod" folder and placing "info.xml" into it. You need only copy that folder to the location of you mod esp and archive mod.
